Uses of Class
hotel.Queue

    • Uses of Queue in hotel

      Methods in hotel with parameters of type Queue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Hotel.addToQueue(Queue[] queue, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String CreditCardNumber, int numberOfGuests)
      Method to add an element into a Queue (LIFO) Calls IsItEmpty() to check if the queue is empty, if so, set front and end to 0 and is ready to store values.
      static boolean Hotel.isItEmpty(Queue[] queue)
      Method to check if a queue is empty
      static boolean Hotel.isItFull(Queue[] queue)
      Method to check if a queue is full
      static boolean Hotel.removeFromQueue(Queue[] queue, Person[] person, Room[] room, int roomAvailable)
      Method to remove an element from a Queue (LIFO) Calls method to addToArray() the item removed into a different array Calls isItEmpty() to check is the queue is empty Calls resetQueueInPosition() to clear the front position calling the addToArray()
      static void Hotel.resetQueueInPosition(Queue[] queue)
      Method to clear the position front, by setting Strings to "E" and Integer to 0
      static void Hotel.viewQueue(Queue[] queue)
      Display an array of type Queue
